title: So, I got an A+
body: I'm just a silver noob playing as ez for fun and went 18/3/9. Game length 35 min and 178 cs. I realize my cs is pretty low but is that why I got an A+ vs. an S-? I'm just curious how it judges your performance and what the system takes into account for grading.

replies.body: it also depends on how well others are doing with the champ and well ez is pretty easy to rack up kills with     play a adc that is used a lot less and this same score-line would most likely net you an s.
3 deaths may also have been slightly too many for an S.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-20T19:53:19.388+0000)
>
> 3 deaths may also have been slightly too many for an S.

Interesting because 1 death per 10 minutes seems pretty good to me, but then again I'm silver and used to seeing deaths more often

> [{quoted}](name=BiZ SneakyBeaver,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-20T19:55:11.166+0000)
>
> Interesting because 1 death per 10 minutes seems pretty good to me, but then again I'm silver and used to seeing deaths more often

Nah dont worry. KDA plays minor role. U gotta aim for 60-70 CS per 10 mins  and 1 wards every 2 mins if u keep yellow trinket. Try to put 2-3 pink wards. ANd u will be fine.
Idk, when I get S, it's usually with something like 13/1/10.  I do place a lot of wards though anyway, so I suppose it could be that.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-20T20:01:07.198+0000)
>
> Idk, when I get S, it's usually with something like 13/1/10.  I do place a lot of wards though anyway, so I suppose it could be that.

I got S with 0:1:0 score after enemy top laner DCed. I farmed shit ton and was warding. Game ended in 17 mins, i stayed top entire game. I got 160 CS and placed ward on CD. See, kills dont represent your performance or your skill with champion. All u need is bad opponents to get kills. But bad opponents cannot affect your CS and warding in any way.

You probably got S that game because you also destroyed a good number of towers.

K/D/A still definitely shows skill on a champion.  It is a basic summary of interaction with allies and opponents.  In a team pvp game, player interaction is generally a display of skill.

Sure, bad players can get you fed, but not if you're equally bad.  You still showed that you were better than your opponent.  It's all relative.  The worst pro may feed his opponent in pro games, but he'd probably wreck the vast majority of the community.
It's pretty good, but the S ranks are supposed to be for extremely good games.  At least, that's how I've considered it.

Thanks for all input guys and gals that helps a lot, I figured CS played a role but I didn't realize how much warding was factored in as well. I just figured since I had 18 kills that it would process that as income as you tend to not need as much CS typically when you are fed.
How many wards did u put and how many of them were pinks?

> [{quoted}](name=alasarcher,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-20T19:51:10.332+0000)
>
> How many wards did u put and how many of them were pinks?

I'm not sure but i had a sweeper and I swept a ton of wards, I stole 2 or 3 blue buffs and swept at least one ward each time around there and usually one or two in river bushes/dragon pit.

> [{quoted}](name=BiZ SneakyBeaver,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-20T19:53:54.221+0000)
>
> I'm not sure but i had a sweeper and I swept a ton of wards, I stole 2 or 3 blue buffs and swept at least one ward each time around there and usually one or two in river bushes/dragon pit.

Well check match history, how many wards did u destroy if u bought sweeper and how many pink wards did u buy.

> [{quoted}](name=alasarcher,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pjLXvf6F,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-20T19:54:44.511+0000)
>
> Well check match history, how many wards did u destroy if u bought sweeper and how many pink wards did u buy.

For some reason my match history page on the web won't come up, good question though, I honestly don't know if I placed a pink or not. I make it a point to buy at least one pink in ranked every game but this was a normal so I'm not sure if I did or not.

> For some reason my match history page on the web won't come up

Try clearing your cache or using a different browser.  It happens occasionally.

getting an S on any ADC is HEAVILY weighted on cs. too much so, but it is based on statistics for a champion. really got crank out that farm.
(source, getting 6 A+s and two S- in a day on varus)
one less death probably would've done it too.
